survey_name: Corporate Sustainability Initiatives Employee Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on corporate sustainability initiatives to improve engagement and effectiveness.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure awareness levels. Ensure answer options are clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How aware are you of your company's sustainability initiatives?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture familiarity with specific initiatives.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's efforts in sustainability?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your company's efforts in sustainability?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your company?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented at your company?

questions.question_text: Have you participated in any of your company's sustainability programs?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to measure participation rates.

questions.question_text: If yes, which programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q5 is answered with 'Yes'.
